summary: This bill, the Federal Subaward Reporting System Modernization and Expansion Act, aims to improve the transparency and efficiency of the federal subaward reporting system. It mandates a report from the Inspector General on the existing system, including recommendations for improvement. The bill also requires the Administrator of General Services to develop and implement a plan to enhance the system, improve data accuracy, standardize reporting requirements, reduce burden on award recipients, and increase data accessibility. Furthermore, the bill expands the reporting requirements to include information on subawards at two tiers and mandates plans from federal agencies for implementation.
